name: Intercept (Flaykes)
description:
This game was created in less than 48 hours as our submission for the Design Den Game Jam 2021 with the theme Loop!

There are a few unfortunate bugs but hopefully it won't break the game.

How to play:

Decode the secret message by intercepting morse code letters near the radio towers!

You can only intercept letters while the light at the tower is turned on.

You also have to intercept the letters in the correct order so you'll need to listen to the morse code coming from the towers.

Once you think you know the message you can press 'F' to submit it.

Controls:

wasd to stear

ctrl to slow down

Enjoy! ٩(◕‿◕｡)۶

Credits: 

Offi - Design, Art

Will - Design, Code
